abstract: Evan Williams and Biz Stone, two of the founders of Twitter, took the stage at the conference to share information on the current state of the company and its users’ habits.
snippet: Evan Williams and Biz Stone, two of the founders of Twitter, took the stage at the conference to share information on the current state of the company and its users’ habits.
lead_paragraph: 5:03 p.m. | Update Added new numbers from Mr. Williams’s presentation.

headline.main: Chirp, Twitter’s First Developer Conference, Opens Its Doors
